abstract: Is there really evidence that JPMorgan Chase was “complicit” in the Madoff fraud?
snippet: Is there really evidence that JPMorgan Chase was “complicit” in the Madoff fraud?
lead_paragraph: The Madoff trustee’s lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase (a k a, at least in this suit, JPMC) reads like no other lawsuit I have read. It begins this way:

headline.main: What Did Chase Know, and When Did It Know It?
